name: product_promotion
description: Modern split-screen product promotion with image on left and content on right

samples.heading: Smart Planner
samples.subheading: Boost productivity with our intuitive planner designed for seamless organization and efficient task management across all your devices.

fieldPrompt.image_url: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality product image with a clean, modern aesthetic. Specify portrait orientation with the product centered and professionally lit, highlighting key features. Include details about background (transparent or solid), lighting setup, composition, and any specific angles that showcase the product's best attributes.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Create a detailed prompt for your company logo. Specify high-resolution image with transparent background for best results. Include details about clarity, recognition, and brand consistency to ensure professional presentation.
fieldPrompt.heading: Write a short, impactful product name or tagline (2-3 words, max 15 characters) that immediately communicates what the product is. Examples: Ultra HD TV, Wireless Earbuds Pro, Smart Fitness Tracker. Use specific, benefit-focused terminology.
fieldPrompt.subheading: Craft a compelling product description (30-40 words, max 300 characters) that highlights key features and benefits. Examples: Experience crystal-clear sound with our noise-canceling wireless earbuds. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike. Focus on what makes the product unique and valuable to customers.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code (e.g., #4A90E2 for blue, #FF6B6B for red) that matches your brand identity or product theme. Choose colors that create the right emotional response and align with your target audience's preferences.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear, action-oriented call-to-action that encourages immediate response. Examples: Shop Now, Learn More, Get Yours Today, Order Here. Make it compelling and easy to understand.
fieldPrompt.price: Enter the product price with currency symbol (e.g., $99.99, €89.99, ₹2,499). Include any discounts, special offers, or promotional pricing if applicable. Make it clear and easy to read.
fieldPrompt.discount_badge: Enter discount text if applicable (e.g., 20% OFF, Limited Time Offer, Flash Sale). Leave empty if not applicable. Focus on creating urgency and excitement around the offer.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website domain where customers can learn more or make a purchase (e.g., yourstore.com, shop.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner appearance.
